title: Better Homes & Gardens Amber and Saffron Scented 2-Wick Jar Candle 12oz Frosted
shortDescription:
Better Homes & Gardens 12oz Amber & Saffron Scented 2-Wick Frosted Jar Candle - This 2-Wick candle from Better Homes & Gardens emits a warm, golden light and fills the room with an intoxicating fragrance. Notes of soft bitter almond and scarlet saffron interweave with delicate white floral jasmine and ambered cedarwood, layered over warming golden amberris, ethereal musk, and smooth santal.

Housed in a frosted glass jar with a printed wooden lid, the candle features a paraffin wax blend for a consistent burn. Its versatile design complements various settings and décor styles, seamlessly integrating with your existing ambiance. Elevate your space with sophistication and style. title: Mainstays Pumpkin Spice Scented 3 Wick Candle, 11.5 oz.
shortDescription: Pumpkin Spice scented candles are a quintessential autumn indulgence, encapsulating the essence of the season in a single fragrance. These candles are beloved for their warm and inviting aroma, featuring prominent notes of pumpkin, nutmeg, and cinnamon that evoke cozy, nostalgic feelings of fall. At the core of a Pumpkin Spice candle lies the rich and earthy scent of pumpkin. This primary note is the heart of the fragrance, conjuring images of pumpkin patches and harvest time. It carries with it a comforting and wholesome quality, making it a perfect choice for those seeking the essence of autumn in their homes. Complementing the pumpkin note is the delightful aroma of nutmeg. Nutmeg adds a layer of complexity to the scent profile, infusing it with a subtle spiciness and a touch of warmth. This note is reminiscent of freshly grated nutmeg used in homemade pumpkin pies, enhancing the overall sensory experience. Cinnamon, another key component of the fragrance, brings a spicy and slightly sweet character to the candle. It conjures memories of cinnamon-spiced lattes and warm apple pies. The combination of cinnamon with pumpkin and nutmeg creates a harmonious blend that envelops your space in a cozy, inviting aura. Together, these notes create a symphony of aromas that capture the very essence of autumn. Lighting a Pumpkin Spice candle transforms any room into a haven of warmth and comfort. The flickering flame and the fragrant notes mingle to create an ambiance that's perfect for gatherings, relaxation, or simply embracing the season.

title: Mainstays Apple Pumpkin Scented 3 Wick Candle, 11.5 oz.
shortDescription: Apple Pumpkin scented candles offer a delightful and evocative olfactory experience that captures the essence of autumn in a jar. These candles are designed to invoke the warmth and comfort of the fall season, with prominent notes of apple butter, cinnamon, and brown sugar creating a harmonious and inviting fragrance. At the core of this fragrance is the sweet and slightly tart scent of apple butter. Apple butter is a beloved autumn condiment, made by slow-cooking apples with sugar and spices until they become a luscious, caramelized spread. In the candle, this note provides a rich and fruity foundation that evokes images of orchards brimming with ripe apples. Complementing the apple butter note is the familiar aroma of cinnamon. Cinnamon infuses the scent with its spicy, warming qualities, reminiscent of freshly baked apple pies and cinnamon-spiced desserts. It adds a comforting and nostalgic dimension to the fragrance. Brown sugar is another essential component of Apple Pumpkin candles. Its sweet, molasses-like scent enhances the overall aroma, creating a cozy and inviting ambiance. The brown sugar note brings to mind caramelized apple treats and sugary pastries, making it a perfect choice for autumn. Together, these notes create a delightful symphony of aromas that capture the essence of fall. Lighting an Apple Pumpkin scented candle fills any space with the comforting and nostalgic feeling of autumn. The flickering flame casts a warm and inviting glow, setting the perfect mood for gatherings, relaxation, or simply embracing the season.
